statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={167.4}{e}^{{{0.0361}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0361}}\approx{1.036759517259}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.036759517259}-{1}={0.036759517259025}\approx{0.0368} and the percent is 3.68.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
